channel.title: Homes on Scott Barnett
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Scott Barnett

item.description:
I am an Associate Professor at the Applied Artificial Intelligence Instititue where I lead a team of software engineers and researchers.

For organisations

I help society and organisations adapt to a world driven by Artificial Intelligence.

For researchers

My current research goal is to improve how we design, build, and test Large Language Model Applications.
